WorkItem.Description:
I am getting this error message when i try to download any character to Rawr from Battle.net: The remote server returned an error: (503) Server Unavailable.
 
Stack Trace:
 
 at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
 
 
I am using the downloadable version of Rawr
WorkItem.Summary: The remote server returned an error: (503) Server Unavailable.

Comments.Message:
Same issue. First saw this error at approx 10:00 GMT 2 Mar 12.

Armory works fine from normal browser.

Wowreforge.com has no problem loading from Armory.

Bug looks specific to RAWR

Been getting this error since approx 10:00 GMT 2 mar 2012.
Armory is fine from a normal browser.
Wowreforge.com has no problem accessing the Armory, only RAWR.
Saved characters (XML) from my hard drive load fine.
Also noticed this morning.   Same as the other two.
Looks like there was a problem with rawr server. It should be fixed now. Let me know if you see any more outages.
